name: @wxyc/backend-services
description: All necessary app services for the WXYC flowsheet backend

scripts.db:start: docker compose -f dev_env/docker-compose.yml --env-file .env --profile dev up -d && sleep 2 && bash dev_env/db_setup.sh
scripts.db:stop: docker compose -f dev_env/docker-compose.yml --env-file .env --profile dev down db -v --remove-orphans
scripts.ci:env: docker compose -f dev_env/docker-compose.yml --env-file .env --profile ci up --build -d && sleep 2 && USE_CI=true bash dev_env/db_setup.sh
scripts.ci:testmock: npm run ci:env && npm run ci:test && npm run ci:clean

author: AyBruno
